channel.title: Posts on ankit sharma
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ankit sharma

item.title: Musings #2
item.description: Oh man, did I skip a beat or what? I had thought that I would be regular in writing these but I have been shit lately.

item.title: Musings #1
item.description: It’s been a while since I have acquired this domain and thought about consistent writing. But, I kept procrastinating. I always felt what exactly should I write, and as I am queering my career in tech, I have plenty to express and write about now.

item.title: Create new Google Doc from the search bar
item.description: TIL, you can create new doc, sheet, slide, form, site or a calendar event from the search bar at the top of the Chrome.

item.title: DFS?
item.description: I have always struggled with Depth First Search, DFS. I now have started solving it using first principles and it has started to make sense.

item.title: How to find good research papers?
item.description: There is plethora of research happening all around us and in the recent times the incoming number of research papers have increased by quite a number.

item.title: The AI Summer
item.description: Meta LLaMA, Stanford Alpaca, PaLM, OpenAI GPT-4. This week has been crazy. The previous week started with the storming LLaMA release from the Meta which advanced to weight leaks on the torrent.

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Hello, World #include <iostream> using namespace std; int main() { cout << "Hello, World!" << endl; return 0; }
